# AudioReader.Configuration

**Structure**

The configuration of the audio reader.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Configuration
```

## Creating a configuration

- **init()**: Creates an AudioReader Configuration
- **init(frameCount:)**: Creates an AudioReader Configuration

## Getting the frame count

- **frameCount**: The maximum size of each buffer in frames. The default value is `4096`.

## Managing buffers

- **AudioReader.AsyncBuffers**: An async sequence of audio buffers read from an audio file.
- **AudioReader.MicrophoneAsyncBuffers**: An async sequence of audio frames.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
